special_text:
[+1]: Tap or untap up to one target permanent. You may put a stun counter on it.
[-2]: Tap up to two artifacts you control. Whenever you tap an artifact this way, Carmella deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, mill until you mill a noncreature, nonland card. Put that card into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.”
